# pop-divider


<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Divider will be used to separate content vertically or horizontally.

## Properties

| Property      | Attribute     | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | Type                                                                                               | Default        |
| ------------- | ------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------- |
| `color`       | `color`       | The color to use from your application's color palette.<br> Default options are: `"primary"`, `"secondary"`, `"accent"`, `"neutral"`, `"info"`, `"success"`, `"warning"`, `"error"`.<br> For more information on colors, see [theming](/docs/theming/basics).                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | `"accent" \| "error" \| "info" \| "neutral" \| "primary" \| "secondary" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `undefined`    |
| `orientation` | `orientation` | Define content disposition orientation                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | `"horizontal" \| "vertical"`                                                                       | `'horizontal'` |
| `placement`   | `placement`   | Where to place the content.<br> - `"left"`: The content will appear to the left of the divider in LTR and RTL.<br> - `"start"`: The content will appear to the left of the divider in LTR and to the right in RTL.<br> - `"center"`: The content will appear to the center of the divider.<br> - `"end"`: The content will appear to the right of the divider in LTR and to the left in RTL.<br> - `"right"`: The content will appear to the right of the divider in LTR and RTL. | `"center" \| "end" \| "left" \| "right" \| "start"`                                                | `'center'`     |


## Slots

| Slot | Description                   |
| ---- | ----------------------------- |
|      | Text for describe the divider |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name           | Description             |
| -------------- | ----------------------- |
| `--background` | Change background color |
